description.raw:
Added parsing and storage of models to the Root and World classes.

There are more test that can be written, but they will require a refactor of the Error class to include a severity level. For example, an SDF file that contains one model error (such as missing a name attribute) out of many models will fail to load all the models. It would be better to load the models that are correct, and report errors on the models that are invalid.

This will come in a follow on PR.
